title: Ash Training Day 1.2
description: Mastering breakouts, inducement, internal structure, and confirmation techniques.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• How to identify valid breakouts
• Understanding inducement and traps
• Internal structure on lower timeframes
• Reaction zones from higher timeframe levels
• Confirmation reduces risk and improves accuracy

quiz.question: What confirms a valid breakout?
quiz.explanation: A valid breakout needs a strong closing candle beyond the level, not just a wick touch.

quiz.question: Inducement in trading means:
quiz.explanation: Inducement is when the market moves falsely in one direction to trap traders before reversing.

quiz.question: Internal structure refers to:
quiz.explanation: Internal structure is the detailed price action on lower timeframes within the larger timeframe structure.

quiz.question: Reaction from HTF zone suggests:
quiz.explanation: When price reacts from a higher timeframe level, it indicates strong institutional interest and a key trading zone.

quiz.question: Confirmation reduces:
quiz.explanation: Waiting for confirmation before entry reduces false signals and minimizes unnecessary risk exposure.
